de.engehausen.kongcurrent
Interface ExceptionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultExceptionHandler
public interface ExceptionHandler

Handles exceptions occurring on monitored methods. The handler is invoked by the Monitor before and after invoking a monitored method.

Method Summary
 void handle(Throwable throwable, Object target, Method method, Object[] args)
          Invoked in case an exception is thrown.
 void postInvoke(Object target, Method method, Object[] args)
          Invoked after the monitored method was invoked.
 void preInvoke(Object target, Method method, Object[] args)
          Invoked before executing the monitored method.
 

Method Detail

preInvoke

void preInvoke(Object target,
               Method method,
               Object[] args)
Invoked before executing the monitored method.

Parameters:
target - the object on which the method will be invoked.
method - the method that will be invoked, never null
args - the arguments that the method will be invoked with, may be null

handle

void handle(Throwable throwable,
            Object target,
            Method method,
            Object[] args)
Invoked in case an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
throwable - the exception that was thrown, never null.
target - the object on which the method was invoked.
method - the method that was invoked, never null
args - the arguments that the method was invoked with, may be null

postInvoke

void postInvoke(Object target,
                Method method,
                Object[] args)
Invoked after the monitored method was invoked.

Parameters:
target - the object on which the method was invoked.
method - the method that was invoked, never null
args - the arguments that the method was invoked with, may be null
